mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: The Syndicate module will display a link whereby people can syndicate your site for all your latest news. When you click on the RSS icon, you will be redirected to a new page that will list all the latest news in XML format. In order to use the Newsfeed in another Joomla! site or a Newsfeed reader, you need to cut and paste the URL.
